title: 13.5.1 Structured logging with CloudWatch Logs
body:
# Objective
Implement structured logging across all application components with consistent format, proper log levels, and efficient log aggregation.

## Requirements
- Implement structured logging (JSON format)
- Configure log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)
- Add correlation IDs for request tracing
- Include contextual information in logs
- Set up CloudWatch Log Groups per service
- Configure log retention policies
- Implement log filtering and parsing
- Add PII redaction in logs
- Set up log-based metrics
- Create saved CloudWatch Insights queries
- Document logging standards

## Acceptance Criteria
- All services logging in JSON format
- Consistent log structure across services
- Correlation IDs linking related logs
- No PII in log messages
- Log Groups organized by service
- Retention policies configured (30-90 days)
- CloudWatch Insights queries saved
- Log-based metrics created
- Logging standards documented
- Search and analysis working efficiently

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Required for: #165 (Application metrics), #166 (Distributed tracing)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 8
**Time:** 1.5 weeks
**Complexity:** Medium
